statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_distance;
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled FROM vehicle_distance WHERE distance_traveled > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_distance ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, end_timestamp FROM vehicle_distance WHERE start_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(distance_traveled) AS average_distance FROM vehicle_distance;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_distance WHERE distance_traveled > 100
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_traveled FROM vehicle_distance ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM vehicle_distance WHERE distance_traveled < 50
SELECT * FROM vehicle_distance WHERE start_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT SUM(distance_traveled) AS total_distance FROM vehicle_distance
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE distance_traveled > 100
SELECT vehicle_id, date FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(distance_traveled) FROM vehicle_data
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE distance_traveled < 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, date FROM vehicle_data WHERE distance_traveled BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM time_periods WHERE start_time <= '2022-01-01' AND end_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(distance_traveled) AS total_distance FROM vehicle_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_distance > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, date FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name,type FROM vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT start_location,end_location,distance FROM trip WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id,end_time FROM trip WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT trip_id,distance FROM distance WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_id ASC, distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE type = 'car';
SELECT id, name, type FROM vehicle ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT v.name, t.start_time, d.distance FROM vehicle v JOIN trip t ON v.id = t.vehicle_id JOIN distance d ON t.id = d.trip_id WHERE v.type = 'bus' AND d.distance > 100 ORDER BY t.start_time ASC;

SELECT v.name AS vehicle_name, t.start_location, t.end_location, d.distance AS trip_distance FROM vehicle v JOIN trip t ON v.id = t.vehicle_id JOIN distance d ON t.id = d.trip_id WHERE t.start_location = 'city A' OR t.end_location = 'city B' ORDER BY trip_distance DESC, t.start_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trips, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM vehicle v JOIN trip t ON v.id = t.vehicle_id JOIN distance d ON t.id = d.trip_id GROUP BY v.name HAVING total_trips > 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM trips WHERE trip_distance > 100;
SELECT trip_id, calculation_date, calculated_distance FROM distance_calculations WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT start_location, end_location FROM trips WHERE trip_distance > 100;
SELECT vehicle_name, trip_distance, trip_duration_minutes FROM vehicles JOIN trips ON vehicles.vehicle_id = trips.vehicle_id;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model FROM vehicle ORDER BY manufacture_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM trip WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM route WHERE trip_id = 100;
SELECT trip_id, distance_in_km FROM distance WHERE distance_in_km > 50;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model FROM vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model, manufacture_year FROM vehicle WHERE manufacture_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM trip JOIN vehicle ON trip.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id;
SELECT trip_id, trip_start, trip_end, distance_in_km FROM trip JOIN distance ON trip.trip_id = distance.trip_id WHERE distance_in_km > 100;
